attributes.action: immediately stop MPs being allowed to decide their own payrises and pension benefits, and instead be subjected to open market pay reviews as in the private sector.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to

government_responses.details:
You recently signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "immediately stop MPs being allowed to decide their own payrises and pension benefits, and instead be subjected to open market pay reviews as in the private sector."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page12874.asp

Prime Minister's Office
